LanguageData.DecreeFailed.stages.decree_failed.label: theip ar mo fhorógra
LanguageData.DecreeFailed.stages.decree_failed.descri: Níor léiríodh meas ar m'údarás ríopa.
LanguageData.DecreeMet.stages.decree_satisfied.label: d'éirigh le mo fhorógra
LanguageData.DecreeMet.stages.decree_satisfied.descri: Léiríodh meas ar m'údarás ríoga, mar is ceart.
LanguageData.Disinherited.stages.disinherited.label: cuireadh as oidhreacht mé
LanguageData.Disinherited.stages.disinherited.descrip: Cuireadh as oidhreacht mé agus chaill mé mo theideal.
LanguageData.NeuroquakeEcho.stages.neuroquake_echo.de: Tá mé timpeallaithe le mothúcháin uafásacha...
